title: Muir Woods National Monument: Do Business With Us
body: Do Business With Us       Most Commercial Operators Must Have a CUA Commercial operators are required to learn and understand the rules, regulations, and park policy about bringing clients to Muir Woods. The 2016 Bus and Tour Guide Manual teaches you everything you need to know.  Â    Commercial Use Authorizations Muir Woods is a part of the Golden Gate National Recreation Area. The GGNRA grants commercial use authorizations for commercial carriers, outdoor fitness operators, and guided services.
